## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand and provide buffer for potential fluctuations, considering current stock and lead time. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 30,000 units - aligns with player's plan. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2 days                                   |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                   |
| Comments                          | Placing a single order of 30,000 units aligns with the player's plan and ensures sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand for the next 5 days. While the player's planned units would meet the predicted demand, a single larger order offers more flexibility to absorb potential fluctuations in demand. |
